allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(intake\): complete CLIENT-INTAKE-AUTOFILL-v1 implementation

- Add intake schema foundation migration \(tables, RLS, triggers\)
- Add intake storage bucket migration
- Create intake Edge Functions:
  - v1-intake-send-link: Send intake form links to clients
  - v1-intake-validate-token: Validate public tokens
  - v1-intake-save-draft: Auto-save draft submissions
  - v1-intake-submit: Final submission with hash
  - v1-intake-inbox: Staff inbox listing
  - v1-intake-submission-detail: View submission details
  - v1-intake-populate: Populate deal from submission
  - v1-intake-request-revision: Request client revisions
  - v1-intake-reject: Reject submissions
  - v1-intake-upload-start/complete: File upload flow
- Add Resend email integration with templates
- Create public intake form page \(/intake/[token]\)
- Create staff intake inbox UI \(/intake-inbox\)
- Fix SendIntakeLinkRequestSchema in shared contracts
- Fix safeDisplayValue for engine output objects
- Add schema seed files for dev/prod

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(intake\): align v1-intake-validate-token response with frontend

Frontend expects flat response format:
- link_id \(not link.id nested\)
- recipient_name \(not link.recipient_name nested\)
- expires_at \(not link.expires_at nested\)
- existing_payload \(not existing_submission.payload_json\)

Also fixes deal context lookup to use top-level address fields
instead of payload.address.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
